title: i lost all my skin and most my champion
body: i dont know if s.o have the same issues. i didnt log in my account for a while, and now when i come back, my champs are disappeared, and now i dont have skin anymore. i dont know how to contact with riot about this ? any recommendation for me now ?

replies.body:
Are you sure you are using the correct account?

There is no reason they would vanish. Contact riot from the game website.
yes because i only use 1 account.
